#summary How to enable Google Ads?
#labels FAQ

 # Configure `google_ad_client` in file `/glossword/templates/common/google_ads.txt`.
 # Uncomment the line 213 in `/glossword/custom_vars.php`:
{{{
$oTpl->addVal( 'block:google_ads', $oFunc->file_get_contents($sys['path_tpl'].'/common/google_ads.txt') );
}}}
